    • Method Detail

      • getAllOptions

        Map<Set<Context>,Map<String,String>> getAllOptions()
        Return all options for all context combinations currently registered.
        Returns:
        An immutable snapshot of all options data

      • getOptions

        Map<String,String> getOptions(Set<Context> contexts)
        Get options for a specific context combination.
        Parameters:
        contexts - The context combination to get options for
        Returns:
        All available options, returning an empty map if none are present

      • setOption

        boolean setOption(Set<Context> contexts,
                  String key,
                  String value)
        Set a specific option to a value.
        Parameters:
        contexts - The context combination to set the given option in
        key - The key to set. Case-insensitive.
        value - The value to set.
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful

      • clearOptions

        boolean clearOptions(Set<Context> contexts)
        Clear all options in the given context combination.
        Parameters:
        contexts - The context combination
        Returns:
        Whether the operation was successful (any options were remowed)
